name.value: US Core CarePlan Category Extension Codes

description.value: Set of codes that are needed for implementation of the US-Core profiles. These codes are used as extensions to the FHIR and US Core value sets.

definition.value: Careplan for identifying all the people and /or organizations who plan to participate in the coordination of delivery of care.
The clinical conclusions and assumptions that guide the patient's treatment and the clinical activities formulated for a patient.
